reviewText:
Deprisa Deprisa features a group of young adults in the semi-deserted outskirts of Madrid living the fast life stealing cars, staging hold-ups, and doing drugs. The hi-jinx and crimes they commit are typical of these action-crime dramas, but what comes as a surprise is that the cast is comprised of non-actors with some of them actually being ex-prisoners. They're as capable in their roles as those who have had training, making both characters and their escapades entertaining enough to hold the attention of most viewers. However, I had expected more plot twists with a less supposable ending.

Cra Cuervos was the first film I saw by the director Carlos Saura. It was artistic, ambiguous, and sometimes difficult to follow, but Deprisa Deprisa is entirely different. It's easy to follow and provides sufficient action for pleasing the moviegoing majority, especially for teens and twenty-somethings. Also worth noting is that Saura tends to side with, or glorify these characters living the delinquent lifestyle. (3.5 stars)

De prisa, de prisa es una de las primeras pelculas del cineasta espaol en las que vincula la msica con el argumento del filme.  Es la historia de un grupo de jvenes rufianes, casi todos actores naturales sacados de la crcel de Carabanchel para respresentar papeles de su vida real en una pelcula. Casi todos regresaron a la crcel, a pesar de que su actuacin fue un xito y que fueron conocidos en toda Espaa.  La pelcula est ambientada por canciones de Los Chuqguitos (Dame veneno, El loco de la calle y la simpar Me quedo contigo) y algunos temas de Paco de Luca y Lole y Manuel.  La pelcula caus una conmocin en Espaa.

Este fiulm se trata de las peripecias de cuatro ladrones de carros que se organizan con una hermosa mesera de un bar para asaltar bancos. Es una historia de amor y de unas tristsimas muertes.
